remarks: Frequently used one-to-one property of lattice translation atoms. (Contributed by NM, 5-May-2013.)
statement:
ltrneq2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrneq2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrneq2.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrn11at $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ P =/= Q ) ) -> ( F ` P ) =/= ( F ` Q ) ) $.
